name: GDPR-Extensions-com – Consent Manager
author: GDPR-extensions.com Team

sections.description:
Ensure GDPR compliance effortlessly with our advanced scanner that meticulously checks your website for cookies, external resources, and security issues. Generate detailed reports for validation and peace of mind. The Consent Manager works in parallel with more solutions developed by GDPR-extensions.com, where you can add GDPR compliant YouTube, YouTube Shorts, Vimeo, TikTok, Google Reviews content elements, and more! For the full solution to work efficiently and for more control over managing your website, you should also install the GDPR Website Manager WordPress extension.

Custom Sections

GDPR Consent Manager

GDPR Consent Manager is a companion feature that allows you to manage the sites and cookies for specific plugins.
1. In the WordPress admin dashboard, locate and click on “GDPR Consent Manager” in the left-hand menu.
2. Inside the “GDPR Consent Manager,” you will see a two tabs one for websites and other one for schedulers.
3. Click on the update for specific site and then you will be able to see two tabs one for site connection & status and other one for cookies widget. From connection & status you will be able to connect your website to dashboard and from the cookie widget you will be able to manage the cookies.

How it Works

Add Your Website:
– Sign up on gdpr-extensions.com.
– Visit the websites page.
– Add your website Title and URL.
– A unique API key is generated for your website, allowing you to connect it to the plugin.

Scan Your Website:
– Visit Consent Manager Tool on your dashboard(https://dashboard.gdpr-extensions.com/).
– Start a new scan.
– Select the website you would like to scan.
– Supports multi-site scanning with site map solution or our advanced crawler scanner.
– A report is generated with the cookies and external resources found on the website(s) you scanned.

Can I customize the description of cookies?

A: Yes, if you have GDPR Consent Manager installed, you can customize the style and text of the cookies for specific plugins.

Third-Party Service

The GDPR-Extensions-com – Consent Manager plugin enhances user privacy by providing a comprehensive solution for managing cookies on WordPress websites.

Service Details

The GDPR-Extensions-com – Consent Manager plugin integrates directly with GDPR-Extensions.com through our dedicated Dashboard. This proprietary service is designed to enhance GDPR compliance for WordPress websites. Our innovative extensions and plugins empower website builders to seamlessly integrate external content while respecting user preferences and data privacy rights. The plugin uses various API calls to connect with the dashboard, ensuring real-time compliance and management capabilities.

Key Links:
– GDPR-Extensions.com
– GDPR-Extensions Dashboard
– Privacy Policy

Developer Notes

This plugin uses the ‘gdprconsentmanager’ prefix for function names and database tables to ensure uniqueness and avoid conflicts with other plugins.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/gdpr-consent-manager directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Sign up on gdpr-extensions.com and add your website URL.
  4. Scan your site for cookies and external resources using the plugin’s scanner.

By installing the plugin, one content elements will be added:
– Cookies & External Resources Report: Displays a report of cookies and external resources found on your website’s privacy statement page.
